type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be StreetlightModel

maxPowerConsumption.description: Property. Maximum power consumption supported by the lantern. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Watts (W)'.

minPowerConsumption.description: Property. Minimum power consumption supported by the lantern. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Watts (W)'.

columnBrandName.description: Property. Name of the column's brand. Model:'https://schema.org/brand'.

columnModelName.description: Property. Name of the column's model. Model:'https://schema.org/model'

columnManufacturerName.description: Property. Name of the column's manufacturer. Model:'https://schema.org/manufacturer'

columnMadeOf.description: Property. Material column is made of. Enum:'steel, aluminium, wood, other'. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

columnColor.description: Property. Column's painting color. Model:'https://schema.org/color'. Allowed Values: A color keyword as specified by [W3C Color Keywords](https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/types.html#ColorKeywords). A color value as specified by [W3C Color Data Type](https://www.w3.org/TR/SVG/types.html#BasicDataTypes)

lanternModelName.description: Property. Name of the lantern's model. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

lanternBrandName.description: Property. Name of the lantern's brand. Model:'https://schema.org/brand'

lanternManufacturerName.description: Property. Name of the lantern's manufacturer. Model:'https://schema.org/manufacturer'

lampModelName.description: Property. Name of the lamp's model. Model:'https://schema.org/model'

lampBrandName.description: Property. Name of the lamp's brand. Model:'https://schema.org/brand'

lampManufacturerName.description: Property. Name of the lamp's manufacturer.

workingLife.description: Property. The estimated number of hours working (the lamp) without failure. Units:'Hours'. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

lampTechnology.description: Property. Technology used by the lamp. Enum:'LED, LPS, HPS'. Or any other value not covered by the above list and meaningful to the application.

colorTemperature.description: Property. Correlated color temperature of the lamp. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Kelvin degrees (K)'

colorRenderingIndex.description: Property. Color rendering index of the lamp. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

luminousFlux.description: Property. Maximum light output which can be provided by the lamp. Units:'Lumens (lm)'. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

powerConsumption.description: Property. (Nominal) power consumption made by the lamp. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Units:'Watts (W)'

compliantWith.description: Property. A list of standards to which this streetlight model is compliant with. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

category.description: Property. Type of asset which implements the street light. Enum:'`postTop, bollard, lamppost, lightTower, flashingBeacon, sideEntry, signLight, ornamentalLantern'. Or any other value not defined above and meaningful for the application
